Text.val: Author Christian Overhoff
Creation: 2005
Status: Ok, 02.11.2005
This task just writes 1 record to the temp memory table.
Depending on the RECIPIENT-parameter, the data comes from
the client or debtor table.
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
29.06.2011 GB SCR16502 Added updates for V.RECIPIENT = 2, 4, 6, 7, 8, 13
19.07.2010 GB SCR15623 Removed the link GNDP
14.10.2008 SH SCR14048 Removed update TPNO_TEXT=DEBP_TEXT in case of
Recipient = 2 and TPNO_TEXT= CLPR125_TEXT if recipient =1
04.04.2007 AK SCR12423 fixed bug in reloading of existing debtor notes
21.03.2007 AK SCR12377 update telephone=DEBH_TEL if no contact person selected
22.06.2006 AK SCR11496 fix bug in the rang oon the DUNH table
13.06.2006 AK SCR11455 fill in the "risk information" checkbox if necessary
(TPNO_RISK_INFO)
07.03.2006 CO SCR10574 Take clients tel-no when person has no tel-no
If there is data and Client Notes are requested, do the link:
if RECIPIENT = 1 than Client needed, if person doesn't have a tel-no:
If there is data and Debtor Notes are requested, do the link:
link DEBH for DEBH_TEL in case there is no contact persoon
search for action 'TEL'
search for action 'RIS'
Get the record (or create one), update data in the Record Suffix:
If there is data and Client Notes are requested, do the block:
If there is data and Debtor Notes are requested, do the block:
RECIPIENT= 2 or RECIPIENT = 6 (Buying group) or RECIPIENT = 8 (Liquidator)
If there is data and Debtor Notes are requested, do the block:
RECIPIENT = 4 (lawyer) and RECIPIENT = 7 (Bailiff)
If there is data and Debtor Notes are requested, do the block:
V.RECIPIENT = 13 (liquidator client)
For all RECIPIENTS:
Is this a risk information note?
Is there text in the note field already or not?
If note field empty, then create the default text in the first line:
The person was not handled today already (=virgin) => Fill with default text:
if TEL note found fill with old TEL texted again:
if RIS note found fill with old RIS texted again:
If note is filled, the exchange the person in first line depending on
person selected before and leave the rest as is:
